artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Sakanaya Eikichi; Carver: Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: Profile of Hiroshige, mourning poem over his death
markings: artist\'s seal: 長煙一空 {Chōen Ikkū} | date seal: 午九 {uma kyū} (Horse 9) | carver\'s seal: 横川彫竹 {Yokogawa hori Take}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 思ひきや落涙ながら豊國画 {omoi kiya rokurui nagara Toyokuni ga}
title: Memorial Portrait of Utagawa Hiroshige
